headline: Top Analyst Reports for Microsoft, Broadcom & McDonald's
summary: Today's Research Daily features new research reports on 16 major stocks, including Microsoft Corporation (MSFT), Broadcom Inc. (AVGO) and McDonald's Corporation (MCD), as well as a micro-cap stock Kingsway Financial Services Inc. (KFS).
